name: Cauliflower with Dijon Sauce
author: gail
summary: Cauliflower, mayo, Dijon mustard, Cheddar cheese: simple and easy.  The amounts may be adjusted depending on the size of your cauliflower. The cauliflower may even be left whole, just remove the core before cooking.
directions: Place cauliflower florets in a large glass bowl or casserole dish, and cover with plastic wrap
Poke a few holes in the plastic with a knife
Cook in the microwave for 5 to 7 minutes, or until tender
In a cup or small bowl, stir together the mayonnaise, and Dijon mustard
Spread over the top of the cauliflower
Sprinkle shredded cheese over the top
Return to the microwave, and cook just until cheese has melted, about 2 minutes
